Project Librem

A project that aims to disconnect the world from your conversations. Source code can be found on the github page here: https://github.com/Ampers97nd/Librem-Legacy

Currently it serves 3 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ampers97nd/Librem-Legacy/master/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
DC E2 F2 21 B8 54 34 7B 1A 13 34 88 6E 07 AD B7 00 41 10 1F 17 4E BB 09 9D 80 38 E8 7A AA 74 FA
